text: and at Gerizim, Andronicus; and besides these, Menelaus, who worse than all the rest, exalted himself against his fellow-citizens. Having a malicious mind5:23 Some authorities read toward the Jews, he sent. The Greek text of this sentence is uncertain.  toward the Jews5:23 Compare 2 Maccabees 4:9, 19; 9:19.  whom he had made his citizens,
